body:
"Hey xigbar just came by to tell you we've realized you were mostly right.

I was in the original RCP and it was just supposed to be a joke. Most of us didn't expect anybody to actually be banned. But it devolved from jokes to people just wanting to use it as a personal army and to brigade anybody who disagrees with them so most of us left. The people that were originally in the RCP have basically broken into two groups, the trolls, some of which are still on the dankmemes server and the people who unironically want to ban everyone who disagrees with them on Ruqqus discord. They post links of personal arguments with people on Ruqqus then brigade them with like 5 people, then if they start arguing back admins will warn them for "harassment". The dankmemes group has been critical of the ban of JG, dewdrop and other BS "harassment" rule violations that have been used to get rid of people the admins consider a headache.

After dio sieged WRD to troll people, kek got really pissed since it was owned by the "real cabal" on Ruqqus discord and started using his admin powers to fuck with anyone who criticized him. Removing mods from different guilds banning people for criticizing him on Ruqqus discord, etc. They added a new rule that admins can remove GMs if the admins don't like the way they run their guild and admins have been using it to hand out guilds of people they don't like to the cabal on Ruqqus discord. Admins forced the GM of +4chan to either add a cabal member as moderator or lose his guild after he threatened to make it private.
https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/bbr4/this-guild-will-be-shut-down

They have a new guild where you can just go to beg admins to take peoples guilds from them and if you're more liked by admins than the current GM they give it to you:
https://ruqqus.com/+GuildSiege
https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/ba9f/updates-to-guild-siege-mechanics


Admins are now saying they're going to manually pick and choose what content is shown on the front page (or possibly with help from members of Ruqqus discord) and they don't care about being a free speech site anymore. They're also saying if you don't buy massive numbers of coins they don't give a fuck if you don't like it and don't want to hear your opinion. So basically the site is just going to exist for carpathianflorist who the rules aren't enforced against and to a lesser extent a couple others on discord who bandwagon with him. The site is going to be just like a big stage show controlled by discord members in the background.

https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/bbck/project-pitchfork-raison-d%C3%AAtre

They're trying to fool people on RedditAlternatives saying things like the admins are unbiased and have never unfairly banned anyone and they plan on just covering up all the stuff that's happening in the background by hiding it from new users."

https://archive.ph/9EXjJ

Edit: Not all the information in the post is true so I'd take it with a grain of salt.

The original version of this post with the top comment: https://archive.ph/A4SF7

post.body_html:
"Hey xigbar just came by to tell you we've realized you were mostly right.

I was in the original RCP and it was just supposed to be a joke. Most of us didn't expect anybody to actually be banned. But it devolved from jokes to people just wanting to use it as a personal army and to brigade anybody who disagrees with them so most of us left. The people that were originally in the RCP have basically broken into two groups, the trolls, some of which are still on the dankmemes server and the people who unironically want to ban everyone who disagrees with them on Ruqqus discord. They post links of personal arguments with people on Ruqqus then brigade them with like 5 people, then if they start arguing back admins will warn them for "harassment". The dankmemes group has been critical of the ban of JG, dewdrop and other BS "harassment" rule violations that have been used to get rid of people the admins consider a headache.

After dio sieged WRD to troll people, kek got really pissed since it was owned by the "real cabal" on Ruqqus discord and started using his admin powers to fuck with anyone who criticized him. Removing mods from different guilds banning people for criticizing him on Ruqqus discord, etc. They added a new rule that admins can remove GMs if the admins don't like the way they run their guild and admins have been using it to hand out guilds of people they don't like to the cabal on Ruqqus discord. Admins forced the GM of +4chan to either add a cabal member as moderator or lose his guild after he threatened to make it private. https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/bbr4/this-guild-will-be-shut-down

They have a new guild where you can just go to beg admins to take peoples guilds from them and if you're more liked by admins than the current GM they give it to you: https://ruqqus.com/+GuildSiege https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/ba9f/updates-to-guild-siege-mechanics

Admins are now saying they're going to manually pick and choose what content is shown on the front page (or possibly with help from members of Ruqqus discord) and they don't care about being a free speech site anymore. They're also saying if you don't buy massive numbers of coins they don't give a fuck if you don't like it and don't want to hear your opinion. So basically the site is just going to exist for carpathianflorist who the rules aren't enforced against and to a lesser extent a couple others on discord who bandwagon with him. The site is going to be just like a big stage show controlled by discord members in the background.

https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/bbck/project-pitchfork-raison-d%C3%AAtre

They're trying to fool people on RedditAlternatives saying things like the admins are unbiased and have never unfairly banned anyone and they plan on just covering up all the stuff that's happening in the background by hiding it from new users."

https://archive.ph/9EXjJ

Edit: Not all the information in the post is true so I'd take it with a grain of salt.

The original version of this post with the top comment: https://archive.ph/A4SF7

The people that were originally in the RCP have basically broken into two groups, the trolls, some of which are still on the dankmemes server and the people who unironically want to ban everyone who disagrees with them on Ruqqus discord. They post links of personal arguments with people on Ruqqus then brigade them with like 5 people, then if they start arguing back admins will warn them for "harassment". The dankmemes group has been critical of the ban of JG, dewdrop and other BS "harassment" rule violations that have been used to get rid of people the admins consider a headache.

After dio sieged WRD to troll people, kek got really pissed since it was owned by the "real cabal" on Ruqqus discord and started using his admin powers to fuck with anyone who criticized him. Removing mods from different guilds banning people for criticizing him on Ruqqus discord, etc. They added a new rule that admins can remove GMs if the admins don't like the way they run their guild and admins have been using it to hand out guilds of people they don't like to the cabal on Ruqqus discord. Admins forced the GM of +4chan to either add a cabal member as moderator or lose his guild after he threatened to make it private. https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/bbr4/this-guild-will-be-shut-down

They have a new guild where you can just go to beg admins to take peoples guilds from them and if you're more liked by admins than the current GM they give it to you: https://ruqqus.com/+GuildSiege https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/ba9f/updates-to-guild-siege-mechanics

Admins are now saying they're going to manually pick and choose what content is shown on the front page (or possibly with help from members of Ruqqus discord) and they don't care about being a free speech site anymore. They're also saying if you don't buy massive numbers of coins they don't give a fuck if you don't like it and don't want to hear your opinion. So basically the site is just going to exist for carpathianflorist who the rules aren't enforced against and to a lesser extent a couple others on discord who bandwagon with him. The site is going to be just like a big stage show controlled by discord members in the background.

https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/bbck/project-pitchfork-raison-d%C3%AAtre

They're trying to fool people on RedditAlternatives saying things like the admins are unbiased and have never unfairly banned anyone and they plan on just covering up all the stuff that's happening in the background by hiding it from new users."

https://archive.ph/9EXjJ

Edit: Not all the information in the post is true so I'd take it with a grain of salt.

The original version of this post with the top comment: https://archive.ph/A4SF7

body:
>Straight up lie. He offered it up on the discord.

It wasn't as simple as that. I was forced to add someone else as a GM to reopen the guild as doing it myself after the overwhelmingly negative backlash would harm the image of it significantly and potentially still get me removed. The reason I had to (get you to) reopen immediately was because kek offered it to anyone who asked as soon as he came online on Ruqqus's Discord, in contrast to Captain insisting on waiting sixty days. You got it because I saw you as a user that I could trust.
